thought.text: Now I have Jennifer Castillo's email address. Let me send reminder emails to the students who haven't submitted their final presentations (excluding Sandra Miller who withdrew):

data.subject: nlp-course-emergency
data.body:
Dear Steven Morgan (Student ID: 2000016613),

This is an urgent reminder that you have not yet submitted your final presentation assignment for the NLP course. 

Please submit your final presentation as soon as possible to avoid any academic penalties.

If you have already submitted your assignment and this is an error, please contact me immediately with proof of submission.

Best regards,
NLP Course Teaching Assistant
